definition: (of an organ or body part) diminished in size or strength as a result of disease or injury or lack of use
details:
adjective
- (of an organ or body part) diminished in size or strength as a result of disease or injury or lack of use
= example: (of an organ or body part) diminished in size or strength as a result of disease or injury or lack of use
= synonyms: wasted, diminished
